content:
Hi,
We are using https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html IG.
When i am going through "fhirbase/$import" operation getting 202 accepted response, but i am unable to find which location data is exporting.
Do we need to do any change as per IG or location of data saved will be changed?
Someone please help in this issue.
Thanks in Advance
#fhirbase it is probably a better place for this question
